title.value: Сортовые ресурсы в оригинальном семеноводстве Могилевской области
Varietal resources in original seed breeding of Mogilev region

person.name: Kuksov, A.I., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Mogilev Regional Agricultural Experimental Station
Romanyuk, M.D., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Mogilev Regional Agricultural Experimental Station

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was considered the production technology of original seeds of potatoes (Solanum tuberosum) in primary links of seed farming of this culture at the Mogilev Regional Agricultural Experimental Station of the National Academy of Sciences of the Republic of Belarus. In course of the study there were presented the results of production of improved test-tube plants by method of propagation; production of seed tubers in a nursery of the first tuber generation; potato yielding capacity and seed yield in the nursery of initial material. Production of original seeds using initially-meristem tissue culture is a key element in improving the yield and gross yield of potatoes. The annual amount received at the Mogilev Regional Agricultural Experimental Station of the original seeds of potatoes (nursery of the initial material), in accordance with the realized calculations, could be enough so that when the existing areas of this crop in Mogilev region Reproduction in potato production enterprises the seedling of potato were above the first reproduction.
